com.vaadin.tapio.googlemaps.client.overlays

Class GoogleMapPolygon

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.vaadin.tapio.googlemaps.client.overlays.GoogleMapPolygon
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    GoogleMapOverlay, Serializable

    public class GoogleMapPolygon
extends Object
implements Serializable, GoogleMapOverlay
    A class representing a polygon overlay of Google Maps.
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      GoogleMapPolygon()
      Instantiates a new polygon overlay using default values.
      GoogleMapPolygon(List<LatLon> coordinates)
      Instantiates a new polygon overlay with the given coordinates, using defaults for other values.
      GoogleMapPolygon(List<LatLon> coordinates, String fillColor, double fillOpacity, String strokeColor, double strokeOpacity, int strokeWeight)
      Instantiates a new polygon layer using the given values.

    • Constructor Detail

      • GoogleMapPolygon

        public GoogleMapPolygon()
        Instantiates a new polygon overlay using default values.

      • GoogleMapPolygon

        public GoogleMapPolygon(List<LatLon> coordinates)
        Instantiates a new polygon overlay with the given coordinates, using defaults for other values.
        Parameters:
        coordinates - The ordered sequence of coordinates of the overlay. Note that the sequence is closed automatically and thus the last value doesn't have to be same as the first.

      • GoogleMapPolygon

        public GoogleMapPolygon(List<LatLon> coordinates,
                        String fillColor,
                        double fillOpacity,
                        String strokeColor,
                        double strokeOpacity,
                        int strokeWeight)
        Instantiates a new polygon layer using the given values.
        Parameters:
        coordinates - The ordered sequence of coordinates of the overlay. Note that the sequence is closed automatically and thus the last value doesn't have to be same as the first.
        fillColor - The fill color of the polygon.
        fillOpacity - The fill opacity of the polygon.
        strokeColor - The stroke color of the polygon.
        strokeOpacity - The stroke opacity of the polygon.
        strokeWeight - The stroke weight of the polygon.

      • setCoordinates

        public void setCoordinates(List<LatLon> coordinates)
        Sets the coordinates of the overlay. Note that the sequence is closed automatically and thus the last value doesn't have to be same as the first.
        Parameters:
        coordinates - the new coordinates
